Package pulse.util

Interface Reflexive

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AbstractReader, CurveReader, DatasetReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsorptionModel, ADIScheme, ApproximatedHessianSolver, BeerLambertAbsorption, DATReader, DiathermicMaterialProblem, DifferenceScheme, ExplicitScheme, GoldenSectionSolver, ImplicitScheme, Insulator, LFRReader, LinearisedProblem, LinearisedProblem2D, LinearSolver, Metadata, MetaFileReader, MixedScheme, NonlinearProblem, PathSolver, Problem, Problem2D, SteepestDescentSolver, TBLReader, TranslucentMaterialProblem, WolfeSolver
    public interface Reflexive
    An object is declared Reflexive if PULsE needs to know all its available subclasses.

    • Method Summary

      Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T extends Reflexive>
      java.util.List<T>      		 instancesOf​(java.lang.Class<? extends T> reflexiveType)
      Uses the ReflexiveFinder to create a list of simple instance of reflexiveType generated by any classes listed in the same package where the reflexiveType is found.
      static <T extends Reflexive>
      java.util.List<T>      		 instancesOf​(java.lang.Class<? extends T> reflexiveType, java.lang.String pckgname)
      Uses the ReflexiveFinder to create a list of simple instance of reflexiveType generated by any classes listed in the package pckgname.

    • Method Detail

      • instancesOf

        static <T extends Reflexive> java.util.List<T> instancesOf​(java.lang.Class<? extends T> reflexiveType,
                                                           java.lang.String pckgname)
        Uses the ReflexiveFinder to create a list of simple instance of reflexiveType generated by any classes listed in the package pckgname.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a class implementing Reflexive
        Parameters:
        reflexiveType - a class that extends T
        pckgname - the String with the package name
        Returns:
        a list of Reflexive conforming with the conditions above.

      • instancesOf

        static <T extends Reflexive> java.util.List<T> instancesOf​(java.lang.Class<? extends T> reflexiveType)
        Uses the ReflexiveFinder to create a list of simple instance of reflexiveType generated by any classes listed in the same package where the reflexiveType is found.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a class implementing Reflexive
        Parameters:
        reflexiveType - a class that extends T
        Returns:
        a list of Reflexive conforming with the conditions above.
